pageContext.claim: “People don’t realize you had 20 terrorist groups in Afghanistan. This is where the World Trade Center people -- I’ll call them 'people' -- were trained. This is what happened. But you had 20 groups -- more than anyplace else.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump came up with this figure by mixing together apples and oranges --two distinct lists of foreign terrorist organizations and groups that financially support terrorists. The official State Department list of foreign terrorist organizations is smaller.
